title: Sonic Mutations
description: Developing software for musicians to use generative AI in live performances at the Sydney Opera House.

title: PANIC
description: An art installation where audiences and generative AI systems shape each other, creating feedback loops between different models.

title: Mixed Reality Navigation
description: Prototypes exploring audio and mixed reality technologies for the future of navigation.

title: Habit Helper
description: A prototype web app exploring how language models can assist in building positive habits.

title: System of a Sound
description: An exhibition giving voice to the hidden data of buildings.

title: Australian Cybernetic Interactive Poster
description: A responsive poster that uses body tracking to morph and transform in response to the viewer.

title: Backwash Homepage
description: An animated homepage showcasing an Australian T-shirt company.

title: Ping 3D Web Game
description: A 3D web game reimagining classic Pong, built with Three.js.

title: Ukulele Hero Controller
description: A 3D printed bluetooth controller for playing Guitar Hero.

title: Cybernetic Star Coasters
description: Laser cut coasters with spinning interiors, designed to spark conversation about systems thinking in executive workshops.

title: Arduino Doodle Jump
description: A doodle jump game displayed on a grid of LEDs.

title: Futures Spinner
description: Spinning chamber used in responsible technology futures workshops with Meta.

title: ARtWalk
description: A mixed reality concept for reimagining the way we experience public art.

title: Woroni Magazine Designs
description: Illustrations and designs for the Australian National University magazine.
